GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v5.10.142
GSD.description:
kcm: fix strp_init() order and cleanup

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.142 by commit 1b6666964ca1de93a7bf06e122bcf3616dbd33a9, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit e5571240236c5652f3e079b1d5866716a7ad819c. For more details please see the references link.
